channel.title: 1 last error please help ! read this please!
channel.description:
[code]client.java:3661: illegal start of expression }public boolean HasItemAmount(int itemID, int itemAmount) { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Please help me with this error i need my server to work. please and thanx!
Also i made some npcs in party room say something and they wont say wat i want them to say they just sit there... dont move...

[code] }
public boolean HasItemAmount(int itemID, int itemAmount) {
int playerItemAmountCount = 0;
for (int i=0; i<playerItems.length; i++)
{
if (playerItems[i] == itemID+1)
{
playerItemAmountCount = playerItemsN[i];
}
if(playerItemAmountCount >= itemAmount){
return true;}
}
return false;
}

item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

[quote=“montalvom, post:16, topic:103057”]i recently added some teles like if u click varrock or falador i made it tele u there and it wont tele there. be 4 it used to say tele out of bounds now i made the code look like this…

[code]public void TeleTo(String s, int level)
{
teleX = absX;
teleY = absY;
newheightLevel = heightLevel;
checkwildy();
if(teleblock == false && actionTimer <= 7)
{
if (s == “Varrock”)
{if (actionTimer == 0) {
teleX = 3213;
teleY = 3425;
newheightLevel = 0;
actionTimer = 50;
}
}

 if (s == "Falador")
 {if (actionTimer == 0) {
teleX = 2965;
teleY = 3379;
    newheightLevel = 0;

actionTimer = 50;
}
if (s == “Lumby”)
{
sendMessage(“Lumby is out of bounds!”);
}

 if (s == "Camelot")
 {if (actionTimer == 0) {
teleX = 2736;
teleY = 3471;
    newheightLevel = 0;

actionTimer = 50;
}

 if (s == "Ardougne")
 {
sendMessage("Ardougne is out of bounds!");
    
 }

 if (s == "Watchtower")
 {
sendMessage("The Watchtower is out of bounds!");
    
 }

 if (s == "Trollheim")
 {
sendMessage("Trollheim is out of bounds!");
 }

 if (s == "Ape")
 {
sendMessage("Ape Atol is out of bounds!");
 }
if (s == "Paddewwa"){

sendMessage("Paddewwa is out of bounds!");
 }

if (s == “Senntisten”){

sendMessage("Senntisten is out of bounds!");
 }

if (s == “Kharyrll”){

sendMessage("Kharyrll is out of bounds!");
 }
if (s == "Lasaar"){

sendMessage("Lasaar is out of bounds!");
 }
if (s == "Carrallangar"){

sendMessage("Carrallangar is out of bounds!");
 }

if (s == “Annakarl”){

sendMessage("Annakarl is out of bounds!");
 }

if (s == “Ghorrock”){

sendMessage("Ghorrock is out of bounds!");[/code]

do u see anything wrong or why this wont work?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 30, 2007, 07:56:30 PM[/size][hr]the camelot one works the rest dont…[/quote]

[code]public void TeleTo(String s, int level)
{

{if (actionTimer == 0) {

teleY = 3425;
newheightLevel = 0;
actionTimer = 50;
}
}

 if (s == "Falador")
 {if (actionTimer == 0) {
teleX = 2965;
teleY = 3379;
    newheightLevel = 0;

actionTimer = 50;
}
if (s == “Lumby”)
{
sendMessage(“Lumby is out of bounds!”);
}

 if (s == "Camelot")
 {if (actionTimer == 0) {

teleY = 3471;
    newheightLevel = 0;

actionTimer = 50;
}

 if (s == "Ardougne")

item.title: 1 last error please help ! read this please!
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

according the where that error was

tryand add this where itsa supposed to go

[code]public void ProjectileSpell(int startID, int movingID, int finishID, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int index, int enemyY, int enemyX, int maxDMG, int lvlReq, int rune1, int rune2, int rune1amount, int rune2amount) {
if(playerLevel[6] < lvlReq) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of “+lvlReq+” to cast this spell”);
}
else if(playerLevel[6] >= -lvlReq) {
if(!playerHasItemAmount(rune1, rune1amount) && !playerHasItemAmount(rune2, rune2amount)) {
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast that spell.”);
}
else /if(playerHasItemAmount(rune1, rune1amount) && playerHasItemAmount(rune2, rune2amount))/ {
//GraphicsHandler.createSpell(startID, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 95, movingID, 43, 31, finishID, enemyY, enemyX, index+1);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
hitDiff = misc.random(maxDMG);
int mageXP = (hitDiff * 4);
addSkillXP(mageXP, 6);

setAnimation(711);
deleteItem(rune1, getItemSlot(rune1), rune1amount);
deleteItem(rune2, getItemSlot(rune2), rune2amount);
//actionTimer = 4;
GraphicsHandler.createSpell(startID, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 95, movingID, 43, 31, finishID, enemyY, enemyX, index+1);
if (server.npcHandler.npcs[index].HP - hitDiff < 0)
hitDiff = server.npcHandler.npcs[index].HP;

addSkillXP(mageXP, 6);
server.npcHandler.npcs[index].hitDiff = hitDiff;
server.npcHandler.npcs[index].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff;
server.npcHandler.npcs[index].updateRequired = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[index].hitUpdateRequired = true;
//actionTimer = 4;
}
}
}
public void ProjectileSpell(int startID, int movingID, int finishID, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int index, int enemyY, int enemyX, int maxDMG, int lvlReq, int rune1, int rune2, int rune3, int rune1amount, int rune2amount, int rune3amount) {
if(playerLevel[6] < lvlReq) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of “+lvlReq+” to cast this spell”);
}
else if(playerLevel[6] >= -lvlReq) {
if(!playerHasItemAmount(rune1, rune1amount) && !playerHasItemAmount(rune2, rune2amount) && !playerHasItemAmount(rune3, rune3amount)) {
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast that spell.”);
}
else /if(playerHasItemAmount(rune1, rune1amount) && playerHasItemAmount(rune2, rune2amount) && playerHasItemAmount(rune3, rune3amount))/ {
//GraphicsHandler.createSpell(startID, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 95, movingID, 43, 31, finishID, enemyY, enemyX, index+1);
hitDiff = misc.random(maxDMG);
int mageXP = (hitDiff * 4);
addSkillXP(mageXP, 6);

setAnimation(711);
deleteItem(rune1, getItemSlot(rune1), rune1amount);
deleteItem(rune2, getItemSlot(rune2), rune2amount);
deleteItem(rune3, getItemSlot(rune3), rune3amount);
//actionTimer = 4;
GraphicsHandler.createSpell(startID, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, 50, 95, movingID, 43, 31, finishID, enemyY, enemyX, index+1);
if (server.npcHandler.npcs[index].HP - hitDiff < 0)
hitDiff = server.npcHandler.npcs[index].HP;

addSkillXP(mageXP, 6);
server.npcHandler.npcs[index].hitDiff = hitDiff;
server.npcHandler.npcs[index].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff;
server.npcHandler.npcs[index].updateRequired = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[index].hitUpdateRequired = true;
//actionTimer = 4;
}
}
}[/code]
